reviews.review_msg: Great prof, one of the best for economics at sfu! Very clear and helpful. A lot of readings, but he clarifies everything for you! A+
Great Prof, lots of readings and in class note taking, but very clear, and explains concepts and ideas really well. Great prof!!!!
One of the nicest and friendliest Econ prof. He explains concepts well but however you have to take your own notes. Lots of readings but it will be no problem in exams if you do read.
